#define ll long long
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define ld long double
int ndig(ll x)
{
	int ans=0;
	while(x)
	{
		ans++;
		x/=10;
	}
	return ans;
}
ld eps=1e-8;
ll doit()
{
	ll x,y;
	scanf("%lld%lld", &x, &y);
	int d=ndig(y);
	ll ans=1;
	ld q=log10(x);
	ld now = q;
	while(1)
	{
		ll qd = now+eps;
		if(qd>=d-1)
		{
			ll qwe = (pow(10, d+now-qd) + eps);
			qwe/=10;
			if(qwe==y)return ans;
		}
		ans++;
		now+=q;
	}
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	int i=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		printf("Case %d: %lld\n", i, doit());
		i++;
	}
	return 0;
}
